ascend_skill.desc:
When using healing skills, grant Starfire I to the main target for 1 turn. After Starfire I ends, grant Starfire II for 1 turn.
Starfire I: Increase Attack by 4% of Lufel's Attack (up to 160).
Starfire II: Increase Attack by 8% of Lufel's Attack (up to 320).
*Starfire does not stack, and only 1 stack is granted.
ascend_skill.name: Redheaded Hero

ascend_skill.desc: At the start of battle, inflict Burn on the foe with the highest remaining HP. Also, increase allies' elemental ailment accuracy by 33% when they have Starfire.
ascend_skill.name: Owl Eyes

ascend_skill.desc: When healing an ally who has Starfire II, increase healing effect by 10%.
ascend_skill.name: Nocturnal

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Owl Fire and Owl Green by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Soaring Bird of Prey

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase party's Fire damage by 32% for 1 turn.
ascend_skill.name: Sheltering Wings of Light

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Healing Satellite and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Preening

ascend_skill.desc:
After Starfire II ends, gain Starfire III for 1 turn.
Starfire III: Increase Attack by 8% of Lufel's Attack, increase Fire damage by 20%, and increase healing received by 10%.
ascend_skill.name: Midnight Bonfire

highlight_skill.desc: Restore party's HP by 59.7%/59.7%/62.2%/62.2% of Lufel's Attack + 1700/2067/1956/2323. Increase party's Attack by 33.2%/33.2%/34.5%/34.5% for 1 turn.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 113.2%/124.8%/117.9%/129.5% of Attack, inflict Burn for 2 turns, and decrease healing received by 30%.
normal_skill.name: Owl Fire

normal_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 67.4%/67.4%/70.2%/70.2% of Lufel's Attack + 1920/2334/2209/2623. If target's HP is below 50%, increase healing effect by 19%/19%/20%/20%.
normal_skill.name: Owl Green

normal_skill.desc: Restore party's HP by 42.1%/42.1%/43.8%/43.8% of Lufel's Attack + 1197/1456/1378/1636. Increase healing effect on the main target by 24%/24%/25%/25%.
normal_skill.name: Healing Satellite

passive_skill.desc: After attacking with a skill, grant Starfire to up to 3 allies.
passive_skill.name: Forest Sage

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect based on Lufel's max HP. The effect is maximized at 12000 HP, and healing effect will increase by 42.0%.
passive_skill.name: Sparks of Support
